English.Name: Magnitude
English.Category:
"Basic Information"[CS:E][BAR][CR]
Inflicts random amounts of damage on
all Pokemon in the room except the
user. It will inflict double damage on a
Pokemon with a [LS:13630]Digging[LE] status.
